channel.title: Castle wars coding help
channel.description: I have a source I have the minigame folders and castle wars is coded in but the castle wars portals do not work and I don't no how to get them to go were they should go like underground how do I fix this.

item.title: Castle wars coding help
item.dc:creator: @darkageisme darkageisme
item.description:
@darkageisme wrote:

[quote=“kickingjamie, post:4, topic:444471”]What base are you using? I’m going to guess it’s Pi based and give you help for that; if not I’m just wasting my time.

Find objectmanager.java and add:

c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(PORTAL ID, PORTAL X, PORTAL Y, 1, 10); Fill in the things that need filling in.

Now open up actionhandler.java and add:

[code] case PORTAL ID:
c.getPA().movePlayer(X COORD, Y COORD, HEIGHT);

Yes is it a pi also i got into the base and it wont give the flag when i click it.
break;[/code] Once again fill in what needs to be filled in.

Save and compile then restart your server and you’ll be done.[/quote]

Read full topic

item.title: Castle wars coding help
item.dc:creator: @kickingjamie kickingjamie
item.description:
@kickingjamie wrote:

What base are you using? I’m going to guess it’s Pi based and give you help for that; if not I’m just wasting my time.

Find objectmanager.java and add:

c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(PORTAL ID, PORTAL X, PORTAL Y, 1, 10); Fill in the things that need filling in.

Now open up actionhandler.java and add:

case PORTAL ID: c.getPA().movePlayer(X COORD, Y COORD, HEIGHT); break; Once again fill in what needs to be filled in.

Save and compile then restart your server and you’ll be done.

Read full topic
